subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: There’s a very good argument to make that American Pharoah has earned his right to spend the rest of his life in the stallion barn, far away from the track and the prospect of injury or even death.
snippet: There’s a very good argument to make that American Pharoah has earned his right to spend the rest of his life in the stallion barn, far away from the track and the prospect of injury or even death.
